```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(DT)

# Define UI for application that draws a histogram
ui <- dashboardPage(
  dashboardHeader(title="FHRS Ratings dataset"),
  dashboardSidebar(
    sidebarMenu(

    menuItem("Rating", tabName = "Ratingspage", icon = icon("dashboard"))
    )
  ),
  dashboardBody(
    tabItems(
      tabItem(tabName = "Ratingspage",h1("Ratings"),
              fluidRow(
                column(12,DTOutput("rating"))
              )
        
      )
    )
  )
)

# Define server logic required to draw a histogram
server <- function(input, output) {
  output$rating<- renderDT(ratingsdata,filter="top",options=list(pageLength=10))

}

# Run the application 
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)


```
